TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewDeleteEventHandler(object sender, FormViewDeleteEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewDeleteEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewDeleteEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewDeleteEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewDeleteEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewDeleteEventArgs ^ e);
type FormViewDeleteEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormViewDeleteEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "删除" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete"）时，但在 控件删除记录之前， 控件将引发 事件。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理方法，该方法在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如在删除记录之前验证记录。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将 委托添加到 控件的 事件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandler2/CS/formviewdeleteeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandler2/VB/formviewdeleteeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式将 委托添加到 控件的 事件。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2/CS/formviewdeleteeventhandlerdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2/VB/formviewdeleteeventhandlerdeclarativevb.aspx#1)]
